projectDescription: A comprehensive personal health management application with health tracking, appointment management, AI-powered symptom triage, medical bill analysis, and accessibility-first design.

phases.name: Phase 1: Core Setup
phases.description: Foundation setup including Next.js, Tailwind CSS, database schema, base components, and application shell.

phases.name: Phase 2: Core Features
phases.description: Essential features including authentication, health tracking, data visualization, appointments, and user settings.

phases.name: Phase 3: Advanced Features
phases.description: Advanced capabilities including AI symptom triage, bill scanning, accessibility, medications, reports, and backup.

packets.title: Initialize Next.js 14 Project with App Router
packets.description: Set up the foundational Next.js 14 project with TypeScript, App Router, and proper project structure for HyperHealth.

tasks.description: Create new Next.js 14 project with TypeScript template
Configure tsconfig.json with strict mode and path aliases
Set up src/ directory structure (app, components, lib, hooks, types)
Create base layout.tsx with metadata and fonts
Add .env.local template with required variables
Configure next.config.js with image domains and redirects

acceptanceCriteria: Next.js 14 dev server runs without errors
TypeScript strict mode enabled with no compilation errors
App Router structure is properly set up
Path aliases (@/*) work correctly
Project follows Next.js 14 best practices

packets.title: Configure Tailwind CSS with Custom Design System
packets.description: Set up Tailwind CSS with a custom color palette, typography, and component patterns for a healthcare-focused UI.

tasks.description: Install Tailwind CSS and required plugins (@tailwindcss/forms, @tailwindcss/typography)
Create tailwind.config.ts with custom color palette (primary green, secondary blue, accent colors)
Define typography scale and font families (Inter for UI, system fonts fallback)
Set up spacing scale and border radius tokens
Create globals.css with base styles and CSS variables
Add dark mode configuration (class-based)

acceptanceCriteria: Tailwind CSS compiles without warnings
Custom colors are accessible (WCAG AA contrast ratios)
Dark mode toggle works correctly
Typography is readable and professional
Design system is documented in comments

packets.title: Set Up SQLite Database with Better-SQLite3
packets.description: Configure SQLite database using better-sqlite3 for local data persistence with proper schema for health data.

tasks.description: Install better-sqlite3 and @types/better-sqlite3
Create database initialization module (src/lib/db/index.ts)
Define user schema (id, email, name, created_at, settings_json)
Define health_entries schema (id, user_id, type, value, unit, recorded_at, notes)
Define appointments schema (id, user_id, title, provider, datetime, location, notes, status)
Create migration system for schema updates
Add seed data script for development

acceptanceCriteria: Database file is created in data/ directory
All tables are created on first run
CRUD operations work for all tables
Foreign key constraints are enforced
Migrations can be run incrementally
Seed data populates sample entries

packets.title: Create Base UI Component Library
packets.description: Build foundational UI components using Tailwind that will be reused throughout the application.

tasks.description: Create Button component with variants (primary, secondary, outline, ghost, danger)
Create Input component with label, error state, and helper text
Create Card component with header, body, and footer slots
Create Modal/Dialog component with accessibility
Create Alert component for notifications (success, warning, error, info)
Create Loading spinner and skeleton components
Create Badge and Tag components

acceptanceCriteria: All components have TypeScript prop types
Components follow accessibility best practices
Components support className override for customization
Focus states are visible and meet WCAG requirements
Components work in both light and dark mode

packets.title: Set Up Application Shell and Navigation
packets.description: Create the main application layout with responsive navigation, header, and sidebar for the health dashboard.

tasks.description: Create AppShell component with header, sidebar, and main content area
Build responsive Sidebar with navigation links and icons
Create Header with user menu, notifications, and search
Implement mobile navigation with hamburger menu
Add breadcrumb navigation component
Create page transition animations

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation is fully responsive (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Current page is highlighted in navigation
Sidebar can be collapsed on desktop
Mobile menu has smooth open/close animation
Navigation is keyboard accessible

packets.title: Implement User Authentication System
packets.description: Build a complete authentication system with email/password login, session management, and protected routes.

tasks.description: Create auth context and provider (src/lib/auth/)
Build login page with email/password form
Build registration page with validation
Implement password hashing with bcrypt
Create session management with JWT or cookies
Add middleware for protected routes
Create password reset flow
Add logout functionality

acceptanceCriteria: Users can register with email and password
Users can log in and maintain session
Protected routes redirect to login when unauthenticated
Passwords are securely hashed
Session persists across browser refresh
Logout clears session completely

packets.title: Build Health Metrics Dashboard
packets.description: Create the main dashboard showing health metrics overview with charts, recent entries, and quick actions.

tasks.description: Create dashboard page layout with grid of metric cards
Build MetricCard component showing current value and trend
Integrate chart library (recharts or chart.js) for trend visualization
Create recent entries list with quick actions
Add date range selector for filtering data
Implement real-time data refresh
Create empty state for new users

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard loads within 1 second
Charts display correctly with user data
Metric cards show accurate current values
Trends are calculated correctly (up/down/stable)
Date range filtering works correctly
Empty state guides new users to add data

packets.title: Implement Health Data Entry Forms
packets.description: Create forms for logging various health metrics: weight, blood pressure, blood sugar, sleep, exercise, etc.

tasks.description: Create generic HealthEntryForm component with metric type selection
Build weight entry form with unit conversion (kg/lbs)
Build blood pressure form (systolic/diastolic)
Build blood sugar/glucose form with meal timing
Build sleep tracking form (duration, quality)
Build exercise log form (type, duration, intensity)
Add notes field and date/time picker to all forms
Implement form validation with helpful error messages

acceptanceCriteria: All forms validate input before submission
Data is saved correctly to the database
Unit conversions are accurate
Date/time defaults to current but is editable
Success feedback is shown after saving
Forms are accessible with keyboard navigation

packets.title: Create Health History and Trends View
packets.description: Build a comprehensive view of health data history with filtering, sorting, and export capabilities.

tasks.description: Create history page with tabular data view
Add filtering by metric type, date range
Implement sorting by date, value, metric type
Add pagination for large datasets
Create detailed trend charts with zoom capability
Add ability to edit/delete individual entries
Implement CSV export functionality

acceptanceCriteria: History loads efficiently with pagination
Filters work correctly and can be combined
Sorting is fast and maintains filter state
Edit/delete requires confirmation
CSV export includes all filtered data
Charts handle large date ranges gracefully

packets.title: Build Appointment Management System
packets.description: Create a complete appointment scheduling and management system with calendar view and reminders.

tasks.description: Create appointments list page with upcoming/past tabs
Build calendar view component (month/week/day views)
Create appointment creation form
Add appointment detail view with edit capability
Implement appointment status management (scheduled, completed, cancelled)
Add provider/doctor management
Create appointment notes and preparation checklist

acceptanceCriteria: Calendar displays all appointments correctly
Appointments can be created with all required fields
Past appointments are archived but accessible
Provider information is saved and reusable
Appointment conflicts are detected and warned
Notes can be added before and after appointments

packets.title: Implement User Profile and Settings
packets.description: Build user profile management with personal info, health goals, preferences, and notification settings.

tasks.description: Create profile page with personal information form
Add health profile section (DOB, height, blood type, allergies)
Build health goals section with target metrics
Create settings page with preferences
Add unit preferences (metric/imperial)
Implement theme preference (light/dark/system)
Add data export/import options
Create account deletion flow

acceptanceCriteria: Profile information is saved and persisted
Health goals appear on dashboard for tracking
Unit preferences are applied throughout the app
Theme changes immediately without refresh
Data can be exported in standard format
Account deletion requires confirmation and removes all data

packets.title: Build AI-Powered Symptom Triage System
packets.description: Create an intelligent symptom checker that helps users understand their symptoms and provides guidance on seeking care.

tasks.description: Create symptom input interface with body map or searchable list
Build symptom questionnaire flow (duration, severity, associated symptoms)
Integrate local LLM for symptom analysis
Create triage result display with urgency levels
Add care recommendation suggestions (self-care, urgent care, ER)
Implement symptom history logging
Add medical disclaimer and liability notices
Create follow-up symptom tracking

acceptanceCriteria: Users can describe symptoms in natural language
System asks relevant follow-up questions
Triage results clearly communicate urgency level
Recommendations are appropriate and safe
Medical disclaimers are prominently displayed
Symptom history is saved for doctor visits

packets.title: Implement Medical Bill Scanner and Analyzer
packets.description: Build OCR-powered medical bill scanning with cost breakdown, error detection, and explanation of charges.

tasks.description: Create bill upload interface (photo capture and file upload)
Integrate OCR library (tesseract.js) for text extraction
Build bill parser to identify line items, codes, and amounts
Create LLM integration for charge explanation
Build cost breakdown visualization
Add common billing error detection
Create bill history and comparison view
Add export for insurance claims

acceptanceCriteria: Bills can be uploaded via camera or file
OCR accurately extracts text from clear images
Line items are parsed and categorized
Charge explanations are understandable to laypeople
Potential errors are flagged with explanations
Bill history is searchable and sortable

packets.title: Add Comprehensive Accessibility Features
packets.description: Implement WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with screen reader support, keyboard navigation, and accessibility preferences.

tasks.description: Audit all components for accessibility issues
Add proper ARIA labels and roles throughout
Implement skip navigation links
Ensure all interactive elements have focus indicators
Add high contrast mode option
Implement font size adjustment controls
Add reduce motion preference support
Test with screen readers (VoiceOver, NVDA)
Create accessibility statement page

acceptanceCriteria: All pages pass WCAG 2.1 AA automated checks
App is fully navigable via keyboard
Screen reader announces all content correctly
Color contrast meets 4.5:1 ratio minimum
Animations can be disabled via system preference
Text can be resized up to 200% without loss of content

packets.title: Build Medication Tracking and Reminders
packets.description: Create medication management with scheduling, dosage tracking, refill reminders, and interaction warnings.

tasks.description: Create medication list management interface
Build medication entry form (name, dosage, frequency, instructions)
Implement dose logging and tracking
Create medication schedule view with today's doses
Add refill tracking and reminders
Implement basic drug interaction checking
Create adherence reports and statistics
Add medication photo storage for identification

acceptanceCriteria: Medications can be added with complete details
Schedule shows all due medications clearly
Doses can be logged with one tap/click
Refill reminders trigger before running out
Interaction warnings are displayed when relevant
Adherence percentage is calculated accurately

packets.title: Implement Health Report Generation
packets.description: Build automated health report generation for doctor visits with customizable time ranges and metric selection.

tasks.description: Create report configuration interface
Build date range selector with presets
Add metric selection checkboxes
Generate summary statistics for selected metrics
Create printable report layout
Add PDF export functionality
Include charts and trend visualizations
Add report history and saved templates

acceptanceCriteria: Reports include selected metrics and date range
Statistics are accurate and clearly presented
PDF exports are properly formatted
Charts are readable in print format
Reports include relevant context for doctors
Previous reports are saved and accessible

packets.title: Add Data Backup and Sync Capabilities
packets.description: Implement data backup, restore, and optional cloud sync for data persistence and multi-device access.

tasks.description: Create local backup to file system
Build backup encryption with user password
Implement backup restore functionality
Add automatic backup scheduling
Create backup management UI (list, delete, restore)
Implement data integrity validation
Add backup reminder notifications

acceptanceCriteria: Backups include all user data
Backups are encrypted and secure
Restore recreates exact data state
Automatic backups run on schedule
Corrupted backups are detected and reported
Users can manage backup history

objectives: Create a user-friendly health tracking dashboard
Enable easy logging of various health metrics
Provide appointment management with calendar view
Build medical bill scanning and analysis
Generate comprehensive health reports for doctor visits
nonGoals: Integration with external health APIs (Apple Health, Google Fit) - future phase
Mobile native apps (PWA only for now)
